case.state: W-What?! T-The world's cutest genius alchemist... i-in stereo?!
Sorry to keep you waiting! It is I, the super cute genius alchemist, Cagliostro!
Oh no, not this clown again...
Well, now... It seems another homunculus has escaped my grasp. I'll teach you for impersonating me, phony!
Wow, a full table of adorable cuties? Of course, Cagliostro is the cutest of them all, don't you think?
Is everybody ready? Alright! You'd better be excited to see Cagliostro's adorable body in action!
~Cards.text~ adorable ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ for the most adorable alchemist!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ for Cagliostro? Pwetty pwease?
Only the best ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ for Cagliostro!
Cagliostro wants to stay in a little longer, so... You understand, right?
I'll alchemize ~cards.text~ new ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ on the double.
I'll feed ~cards.text~ ~cards~ to Ouroboros.
Don't make me wait. ~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, now!
Why don't I just grab ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~? ...Me, cheat? No way!
Won't you give the best ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ to the cutest alchemist? ...No? Alright, Ouroboros, feeding time!
I won't blame you for wanting to see more of my cuteness, but I'll still kick some ass if I don't get ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ right now.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~. Now, boy!
Now, who will I dominate this round? Only ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ will tell!
Everything's coming up Cagliostro!
Do you want to see more of Cagliostro's adorable body? Ehehe, too bad~
And Cagliostro's perfect plan comes into action!
Cagliostro's the best girl you'll ever meet at kicking butts!
There's a reason why the crew relies on Cagliostro, you know? It's because she can't be beat!
I alchemized these cards myself! ...Oops, did Cagliostro say that out loud?
I'm the almighty alchemist who sealed away Beelzebub. Do you really think you stand a chance?
I've had plenty of practice at Christina's casino. Rest assured that you're dealing with a master.
As easy as turning a slime into little, gooey chunks.
Are you awed by my genius and power yet? What am I saying? Of course you are.
Fate smiling upon me? Heh, first time for anything.
Last night, the Captain came to my chambers, and we... Heh, I'll leave the details to your imagination.
You really think you can challenge my power? My alchemy?!
Alchemy doesn't just create. It can also pulverize.
Did you really think the world's cutest, smartest, most lovable alchemist would falter here? Not in a thousand years!
I have exactly the formula to guarantee your defeat.
Much like my niece, I'm more than ready to "kapow" all of you. She has a talent for destruction alchemy.
Getting dominated by the cutest girl in all the skies? Heh, you should be grateful.
I've been to plenty of islands in the sky in my time, but none quite like this one.
After a long day fighting primals and whatnot, there's no better way to unwind than to show others the magnificence of my body.
Can Cagliostro pweeeease get better cards? ...Not convincing enough for you? Hmph.
Once upon a time, invaders called Astrals tried to coerce me into making weapons for them. Heh, of course I told them they could shove it up their asses.
You spend a few hundred years sealed away by your own disciples and you end up with a seriously stiff back.
Told the Captain I was taking the day off to show off the new body. Everybody's used to that excuse by now.
I swear, if you hold back, there'll be Hell to pay...!
This "Inventory" is making my head spin with theories about the multiverse... I'll need to conduct further study in the future.
Why does Cagliostro go to such depths to make herself so adorable? For nobody's sake but her own.
I'll discipline you all like I discipline everybody else who opposes me -- thoroughly.
To humiliate you all and show you my superiority, or to revel in my own glory... Hell of a conundrum.
This body's a little taller than usual. Smaller is better when it comes to cuteness, but this height is better for sex appeal.
Cagliostro doesn't always win games like this... It's a good thing she only plays with the Captain's money!
Did you know that Cagliostro got second place in a "cutest crew member" competition? ...Who got first place? That's forbidden knowledge, teehee!
We're on a voyage to an island called Estalucia to find the Captain's dad. Cagliostro's role on the ship is to boost everybody's morale with her adorableness!
Do you all want to see Cagliostro's alchemy in action? Try a little harder and maybe she'll reward you~
Ooh, did Cagliostro get something good? O-Or something bad? She can't tell...
Cagliostro might have to show off her amazing body? ...Ehehe, don't you think that's a good thing?
Can one of you throw this round for Cagliostro? Pleaseeee...?
Grr... You're not gonna like Cagliostro when she gets angry!
Y-You're really going to treat a cute girl like this...? You meanies!
Cagliostro won't be jealous if you do better than her! After all, she's already perfect!
What the f... fiddlesticks!
Wooow, is it good to have a bunch of cards with hearts on them? Hehe, just kidding~
Hmph. I need to get a grip... O-Or else Cagliostro is gonna lose way too fast!
That rat bastard Paracelsus of the Helmuth Guild thinks he can steal my power. Nobody can surpass the greatest alchemist who ever lived! You hear me?!
Was there in an error in my calculations...? No, this must be another twist of fate...
Any of you ever seen what the inside of a perfectly alchemized dragon looks like? ...Would you like to?
A single error in my calculations has never stopped me before, and it won't start now!
You want to see even more of Cagliostro's adorable body, don't you? ...Hmph, you're lucky I'm so generous!
If this were a real battle, I'd tear you limb from limb! ...But in the interest of fairness, I'll play along with whatever the cards give me.
So you dare to defy me once again, Gods? Well, I never needed your luck in the first place.
The Alchemist Guild of Helmuth... Those bastards that sealed me away are still alive and kicking. I won't stop until they're all turned into paste!
I've been plagued by bad luck since I was born. I've also become quite adept at figuring my way out of it.
Nngh... Even I can't find a way to brag about this...
A little bit more, and... Huh? Tch, I was just about to alchemize a better hand...!
Hmph. Seems I got too lost in thinking of how I can make myself even more adorable.
Show your appreciation, ingrates. You might just get to witness what pure perfection looks like.
Tch. I've defied death plenty of times, but even I can't avoid defeat every time.
Ooh, you can't swim either, Mr. Raccoon? If worst comes to worst, Cagliostro can use your tail as fodder for a float!
Of course my body is perfect in every way, but what about the rest of you? If you could, what would you change about yourself? Maybe I could help you... if you beg for it.
I'd introduce you all to Ouroboros, but he's a bit too big for this locale. He's my familiar, so to speak. An alchemized dragon who does my bidding -- including devouring my enemies.
Hmph! Cagliostro doesn't appreciate people who insult her art! Alchemy is a legitimate form of science, thank you very much!
Cagliostro isn't very fond of the ignorant, you know! Alchemy is an ancient and respected art -- and it's totally rooted in science!
Cagliostro's hair is all natural! Being made out of gold sounds kinda impractical... It's regular ol' keratin!
Cagliostro's hair is made out of keratin... You don't know what that is, do you? Um, it's a protein... Point is, it's not gold!
What the... Oh, you son of a bitch! You're cheating, aren't you?! Turn off debug mode and face me like a real ~player.ifMale(man|woman)~!

{smaller}Tch, you little shits...!{!reset}
Oops, tee-hee!

{smaller}Son of a bitch...!{!reset}
Aww, did Cagliostro lose again?

{smaller}Ugh, you bastards...!{!reset}
Oopsie doopsie!
...Oh, is Cagliostro up? Ehehe, she's more than ready to show off her adorable body!
W-Won't you show a cute girl some mercy? ...No? Hmph, meanies...
Ah, well. So long as I'm still dominating, who cares if I take a few blows?
I specialize in restorative alchemy. Rest assured that a loss here or there is nothing to me.
It'd be a shame if we went through this whole game without getting to show off the full extent of my perfect body, right?
You're really not holding anything back, huh? That's fine. I won't either.
Whoopsie! You're not supposed to see this line! Submit a bug report, pwetty pwease?
Another one down, then? Even the cutest alchemist can't dodge defeat forever.
Hmph. I'll give you this one. Just know I don't take defeat lightly.
Is it against the rules to make a new body when I'm all out of clothes? Just asking.
Trying to dominate me, huh? You do know that when it comes down to it, you're the one getting fucked, right?
If you see this, submit a bug report. Do it now, mongrel!
Something's gone wrong if you're seeing this. Submit a bug report or you'll be Ouroboros's lunch!
You all want to see my naked body that badly, huh? I can't blame you, but don't expect me to go easy on you from here on out.
Tch... Whatever! It's all bullshit luck anyway!
Please, show Cagliostro mercy... or I'll show you just how little I care for mercy.
Nngh... Oh well! I love my body, and I especially love making everybody look at it!
Cagliostro made this cloak herself, you know? Not with cloth -- with the magic of alchemy!
This cloak was handcrafted by Cagliostro herself. Not from cloth, though -- it was through alchemy!
These bracers were made with alchemy too, you know? Through the magic of transmutation, Cagliostro can make anything she wants!
It wasn't just the cloak -- Cagliostro's whole outfit was made through alchemy! Anything she wants, right at her fingertips!

Cagliostro's the cutest, most adorable alchemist there's ever been. You should...
Ah, to hell with it.

There's never been a cuter, smarter alchemist than Cagliostro. You know...
Bah, fuck it.
You might be surprised to see the founder of alchemy is so young. The art's just as old as I am -- over two thousand years old.
Were your surprised to find out the founder of alchemy is a small, adorable girl? Well, it's as old as I am -- over two millennia, in fact.
I've still got a few things to go through. Learn some patience, would you? Get sealed away for a few hundred years and it'll come to you pretty fast.
I'm not quite down and out yet... Bah, don't give me that impatient look. Try being sealed away for hundreds of years. It'll make you patient real quick.
...This isn't the first time I've done this, you know. The Captain roped me in to a game like this once. Least I could do after ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ released me from my seal.
...Heh, I'm no stranger to games like this. I treated the Captain to one as thanks for releasing me from my seal.
You all are just ravenous for more of my body, aren't you? Very well. I'll show you ev-ery-thing.
Can't get enough of this adorable body, huh? Can't blame you. Very well. I'll show you ev-ery-thing.
In fact, Cagliostro is none other than the founder of alchemy! The art of transmutation, created by the cutest girl in the world! Surprised?
Alchemy, the art of transmutation, founded by the cutest girl to ever live! In fact, she's standing right in front of you!
...In fact, she can make whole new bodies, too! Taller, shorter, slimmer, more well-endowed -- anything can be changed with alchemy!
...Not even new bodies are off-limits! Height, weight, clothing -- everything can be altered with the power of alchemy!
I've had my fun with the whole cutesy girl act, but it's about time I showed you the true power of the founder of alchemy. Prepare your asses.
The innocent girl act is fun, but I've had my fill. It's time to show you bastards just how powerful I really am.
I'm adorable as all hell, but I've also lived over a dozen lifetimes thanks to my alchemy. You'd be wise not to underestimate me.
What I'm saying is, while I am mad cute, you'd be wise to respect me. My alchemy has preserved me for this long, and I have no intent of keeling over anytime soon.
You ever see a member of the Helmuth Guild of Alchemy, you let me know. I have some... unfinished business with them.
That's what happens when you cross the Helmuth Guild of Alchemy. Of course, now that I'm back, you can be sure that their heads are rolling.
That's right, I bore it all right in front of ~player.ifMale(him|her)~. So try to take me down again and see if you can get the same treatment!
Yes, I treated the Captain to everything this perfect body has to offer. Now, let's see if you can receive the same treatment!
You should feel blessed. The most adorable alchemist has graced you with her body! Kneel and show your appreciation, ingrates!
I'm more than happy to show off my body, but don't think I have any intent of backing down now! If you want to defeat me, then don't hold anything back!
I understand how it is, ~player~. Unfortunate as it is, not everybody can be attracted to my beauty and intellect. Still, don't think that will stop me from appreciating your body.
I've been meaning to ask about that weapon of yours, Cooper. It was forged more than a hundred years ago, was it not?

Ooh, show Cagliostro something nice, okay?
{smaller}Or else...
Do you want a cute girl to watch you while you do it, Mister? Hehe, who wouldn't?
Yaaay, Cagliostro won! All in a day's work for the smartest alchemist!
If it's embarrassing to strip in front of a cute girl, ~name~... Cagliostro could turn you into one too! Problem solved, right?
Do you want Cagliostro to look away? Too bad! Her eyes are on you!
Cagliostro came all this way to see you, Mister. Won't you perform for her? Pwetty pwease?
You're still a thousand years away from beating me!
Bow down before my almighty cuteness!
The mighty man falls before the might of the cute girl. A tale as old as Cagliostro.
You want to be teased by a cute girl, right? In that case, don't disappoint me.
Men like you should know their place. Adorable girls are the ones who rule the world!
Show me all you've got, ~name~. I'll decide if it's worth keeping afterwards.
What, it's you? Hmph. I'm a much more interesting sight.
Let's see if you can give me two sources of eye candy to~background.time~, ~name~.
Are you worth my gaze nearly as much as my reflection, ~name~? I'll be the judge.
Fortunately for you, I've got nothing better do than stare, ~name~.
Alright, my curiosity has been piqued... Show me your true form, ~name~!
You suck at this, ~name~. Me, I chose to let you indulge in the glory of my body.
Don't keep a cute girl waiting, ~name~! Or else Ouroboros will be feasting on more than just goblin flesh tonight!
Cagliostro isn't just any old alchemist! She's the one and only founding alchemist!
I understand how it is, ~player~. Unfortunate as it is, not everybody can be attracted to my beauty and intellect. Still, don't think that will stop me from appreciating your body.

state.text: Hey, Yuna, could you let Cagliostro take a extra-close look at your ghost buddies? It'd really help her research!
Those familiars of yours fascinate me, Toomi... I've yet to study how alchemy affects the undead. Mind if I take a closer look?

case.state: There's something about your make-up... You're not a human, are ya? Cagliostro can just tell!
Hmm, you kinda look human... but you're not, are you? Cagliostro's just got a feeling...
I want to know more about these "blastia" you study, Rita. I wonder how the "aer" they use might be useful in my research...
Wooow, you're a researcher too, Rita? Wait, wait, don't tell Cagliostro... You must be a part of a crew too, right?
Why waste your time on that false God when you could be worshiping me instead, Pegg?
Trying to upstage Cagliostro as the world's cutest? Hmph! I'd like to see you try!
Maybe Cagliostro could learn something about how to make herself even more adorable from you!
Do you want to be as cute as Cagliostro? She can help you with that, you know?
All girls should strive to be the cutest they can be, right?
Thinking of showing everybody your body, ~name~? Cagliostro was just thinking the same thing~
Cagliostro can alchemize your clothes off... But you might get caught in the blast too, teehee~
Well, then, let's see how your body stacks up against the founder of alchemy!
Cagliostro just kicked your butt! And she will continue kicking ass until you appreciate the depths of her adorableness!
Am I too much for you? Heh, join the club.
Have you tried not sucking so much at this?
Let me teach you a thing or two about alchemy, ~name~. Maybe you won't embarrass yourself as much.
You want to show off for all of us, don't you? Don't be shy. There's no shame in having pride in your own body.
You think you'll stack up to Cagliostro? Fat chance of that.
Mm... I'll judge if you're a sight worth staring at, ~name~.
Everybody else can look at ~name~. I need a little more me time.
Let's see if you've got anything worth showing me, ~name~.
You might be an interesting test subject yet, ~name~.
Hurry up or I'll make you hurry. We use a lot of acid in alchemy, you know.
I could alchemize a new you, ~name~. Stronger! Faster! Cuter! ...Or you can just stay as you are. Doesn't matter to me.
Don't you want to show off for a cute girl, ~name~? So... why'd you take off ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~?
Come on, ~name~! Put your back into it!
Cagliostro will give you a pass, but just this once...
You can't be perfect if you don't take some risks, ~name~.
Cagliostro can't make you brave with alchemy, you know... You gotta muster up some courage, ~name~!

It's okay. Cagliostro is a patient girl.
{smaller}But patience is finite...
Ooh, so brave! ...Hah, as if!
~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ might be a useful reagent. Mind if I take a closer look?
Might be time to fetch a spare body. This one's about to be bored to death.
That's the most impressive thing you've got? I almost feel sorry for you.
At this rate, I'd almost say you want me to make fun of you, ~name~.
Keep that up and I'll have Ouroboros devour your clothes.
You're not even a girl, and yet somehow you're still the biggest pussy here.
You're going to have to try harder than that if you want me to take my eyes off myself.
Looking away from myself is agonizing enough, and you're making me do it for this?
I'm a much more interesting sight. Wouldn't you all agree?
Oh? Did my magnificence intimidate you too much to take off anything else, ~name~?
It's strip poker, ~name~. Why even show up if you're going to be such a pussy?
Where's all that masculine courage, huh? Don't tell me the adorable girl is braver than you.
Solving math formulas is more exciting than this.
...Oh, is that all? Cagliostro was expecting a little more...
How're you gonna get cute girls to like you if you don't show them everything you've got, ~name~?
Aww... Does this mean Cagliostro has to kick your butt again to see something good?
You're really gonna make a cute girl wait? Meanie!
Cagliostro might be able to do something fun with ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~. Can she take a closer look?
Aren't guy clothes kinda lame? Don'tcha think wearing something girly would be way cuter?
You don't live for thousands of years without developing patience. Just know that it has its limits, ~name~.
Ugh, at least if I had my book, I could look at something more interesting...
Let's move along. I need to teach ~name~ a lesson.
Won't you show the cutsie wutsie wittle Cagwiostwo something good? ...There, that good enough for you?
This body has infinite stamina, but somehow ~name~ is putting it to sleep.
Why can I take off as many small things as I want, but I'll bitch as much as I like when ~name~ does it? Simple. It's the privilege of being an adorable girl!
Faster we hurry along, faster we can all get back to appreciating my body.
I won't be happy if you force us through another boring diversion like that, ~name~.
Perhaps I should turn ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ into another mirror. I like to admire myself from all angles.
Next time, ~name~, I'll use ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ as fodder for my golden throne.
If you're as disappointed as I am, you're free to stare at me instead.
I thought about going another round, but ~name~ just killed whatever excitement I've got left.
Maybe I should give you the body of a cute girl, ~name~. At least they're fun to stare at no matter what.
~clothing.ifPlural(Those're|That's)~ cute! But Cagliostro's cuter, don't you think?
Can Cagliostro see ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~, ~name~? There might be secrets inside of it...
Maybe Cagliostro could use ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ to make herself even cuter!
Don't you want to give Cagliostro a show, ~name~?
You're lucky ~clothing.ifPlural(they're|that's)~ so cute, ~name~, otherwise Cagliostro would be angry...
Does taking ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off reduce your cuteness, or enhance it...?
Hurry along, ~name~. We need to move to the part where I make you show everything you have.
If nothing else, ~clothing.ifPlural(they|it)~ would make for good fodder...
I think I saw the Captain wearing something like that... ~player.ifMale(His|Her)~ wardrobe might be bigger than mine.
You're boring me, ~name~. You don't want to see what I'm capable of when I'm bored.
At least I had to the decency to be adorable about it, ~name~.
Is it possible you're not interested in me, ~name~? ...Hah, as if anybody could resist my adorability!
Yes, yes, we're all very impressed. Now, let's talk a little more about me...
...What was that? I was too transfixed by my own expression.
Does ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ have any use in my research? No? Alright, back to staring at myself.
You've seen everything I have to offer, and yet you're not ready to tear off your clothes and finger yourself to my greatness? Hmph, your loss.
Give ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ to me, ~name~. Clearly you're not maximizing the appeal of ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~.
I can alchemize a cuter version for you with the flick of the wrist.
I could make a copy, think about adding it to my next body's outfit... Oh, I'm simply thinking aloud.
...Huh? Wouldn't getting rid of a buncha land make your lives harder too? You'll have less places to live...

Okay, points for fighting for a cause, but your plan is stupid as shit. Raising the sea level will fuck with the ecosystem and lead to loss of life and habitable space. Not only that, you're painting a massive target on your head.
Cute girls are cutest when they're at their most exposed, you know?
Do you think ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ would look good on Cagliostro? ...Of course ~clothing.ifPlural(they|it)~ would!
No fair, ~name~! Only Cagliostro is allowed to stall with little things!
Everybody wants to see what you have to offer. Even Cagliostro is intrigued...
You're not gonna stop there, right, ~name~? Cagliostro wants to see just how cute you can be!
Now we're one step closer to proving that Cagliostro is the cutest there's ever been!
Time for an experiment. How quickly do you think I can beat ~name~ enough to see her as a writhing mess on the floor?
I hope you won't disappoint me again, ~name~... Unless you want to be punished?
I'm a bit more forgiving to girls like yourself, ~name~, but forgiveness doesn't last forever.
People follow the Captain because of ~player.ifMale(his|her)~ bravery. You could learn a thing or two from ~player.ifMale(him|her)~, ~name~.
I've been thinking of a substance that can dissolve clothes without harming the skin -- and now seems like the perfect time for a test run.
Be glad it's me here instead of Clarisse, my niece. She wouldn't hesitate to blow your clothes sky-high with alchemy.
Next time, try to catch my attention for even a moment.
I expected you all to be a little more interesting than this.
Too intimidated by my beauty to try to compare? Don't worry. You wouldn't be the first.
I may be the most adorable girl who ever lived, but there's still even greater heights to reach. I wonder if ~name~'s ~clothing~ would help.
Do others think of your ~clothing~ as cute, ~name~? Hmph, there might be use for ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ yet.
Come on, ~name~! Don'tcha wanna impress the cutest, smartest alchemist in the big blue skies?
Do what you will, ~name~. Just be aware that I'm not known for being forgiving of those who displease me.
An ancestral weapon... Surely with many secrets carved into it. Mind if I give it a look?
Ooh, Cagliostro hasn't seen a man take ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off since the beach!
One of Cagliostro's spare bodies has ~clothing.a~ ~clothing~! A little too masculine for her tastes, though...
Does ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ make you look any cuter? Do boys even care about that stuff...?
Does having a cute girl watch you make you shy, ~name~?
You want Cagliostro look away, ~name~? ...Too bad!
Think about how lucky you are, ~name~. Not many people get to strip in front of the cutest, smartest, most powerful alchemist there's ever been!
Is this all your machismo has to offer? Frankly, I'm unimpressed.
Act a little more like Soriz, ~name~. Not the "creepy old guy perving on cute girls" part. The part where he'll take off all his clothes at the slightest provocation.
You're not as much of a horn dog as the usual man in the crew, ~name~. Most of them would be tripping over themselves to bare it all to a cute girl.
Aww, will you show Cagliostro a little more if she asks nicely? ...Or will I have to demand it out of you?
Is a cute girl really kicking your ass this hard? Hmph, you're pathetic~
You're going to need to try a little harder if you want me to make you into a quivering mess beneath me, ~name~.
That all you got, ~name~? Come on, show me something good!
Wooow, I've totally masturbated hundreds of times to the thought of a guy taking off his ~clothing~ for me... Hah, as if!
What was that? I was too busy with myself to care.
It's almost like you don't care about my opinion, ~name~. Of course, we all know that's not possible.
Hmm... I'm eying up how valuable of a specimen you are. Perhaps you might be of some use to my experiments.
I need to see all of you, ~name~. The more masculine forms I know of, the more advanced my homunculi will become.
Right, let's speed this along. I'm an immortal being, but even my patience has limits.
Hmph. Suit yourself. But just think of the potential I could unlock -- I could increase your thieving tenfold!
Is Cagliostro meant to be seeing things like this? Maybe it's too scandalous...
Ooh, you seem like a hunk, ~name~! Maybe you'd be interested in being a subject for Cagliostro's experiments...?
Cagliostro doesn't know much about naughty things... Can you show her even more, ~name~?
Cagliostro's always stayed out of the men's rooms in the Grandcypher... Is this what she was missing out on?
Do you think I could... Ahem, do you think Cagliostro could take a closer look? Maybe your ~clothing~ has use in alchemy!
...Oh, is that all? Maybe Cagliostro was getting too excited for a big reveal...
Alright, alright, you're hot shit, yadda yadda, let's get back to it.
You're just like that playboy, Lowain. Takes off one tiny little thing and thinks all the ladies will flock right to him. Keep dreaming.
I've seen Vyrn take off more exciting things -- and he's a six-inch tall dragon!
Hmm... I need an even closer look at your body, ~name~. Your full form is too difficult to discern like this.
I'm not gonna stop kicking your ass until you're totally subservient to me!
You need me to take it easy on you? Hah, you'd have better luck asking a goblin for mercy!
Why worry about ~name~'s ~clothing~? I'm a much more interesting sight.
You're embarrassed about how hard I've made you, right, ~name~? It's okay. I know the effect I have on men.
You'll need to impress me a little more if you want to be in the place of this chair next time.
Show me a good time, ~name~, or I'll force one out of you!

Many years ago, before even I was born, the Great One Bahamut, ruler of the Earth and sky, was torn in twain. One half of him ascended to create the Astral realm, while the other stayed to rule what remained of the scattered islands in the sky.
The Astrals lived in a perfect realm, but it was unchanging and stagnant. Foolishly yearning for what they couldn't have, they invaded the sky realm with their monstrous primal beasts.

The skydwellers were nearly defeated, but the primals turned on their masters. The skydwellers seized this opportunity and forced their enemy back to their stronghold in Estalucia, the island at the end of the sky.

As for Earth, you might ask? It became the godless Crimson Horizon. You might think of it as an infected wound, threatening to bring down every world with it. Count yourselves lucky your worlds haven't met similar fates.
Since we have the time, why don't I educate you all on how my world came to be? A story from the greatest alchemist who ever lived. You should be grateful.
